price: او موږ هيله من يو چې زموږ رب به زموږ ګناهونه وبخښي ځكه چې موږ تر ټولو مخكې ايمان راوړی دى.
arabic: إِنَّا نَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: innā naṭmaʿu an yaghfira lanā rabbunā khaṭāyānā an kunnā awwala al-mu'minīna
